price: Idan Mun so zã Mu saukar, a kansu, da wata ãyã daga sama, sai wuyõyinsu su yini sabõda ita sunã mãsu ƙasƙantar da kai.
arabic: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in nasha nunazzil ʿalayhim mina al-samāi āyatan faẓallat aʿnāquhum lahā khāḍiʿīna
